FuncDef:
The mld snooping group-policy command sets the range of multicast groups that hosts can join.
The undo mld snooping group-policy command cancels the configuration. The mld snooping group-policy command sets the range of multicast groups that hosts can join. The undo mld snooping group-policy command cancels the configuration. By default, hosts can join any multicast groups. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an ACL6 number.
The value is an integer ranging from 2000 to 3999.

Specifies the name of a named ACL6.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. The name must start with a letter or digit, and cannot contain only digits.

Specifies an MLD version.
The value can be 1 or 2.
